text: Herb Alpert (born March 31, 1935 in Los Angeles, California) is an American musician. He is known for his trumpet playing with his group, Tijuana Brass. He is also the co-founder and one of the heads of A&M; Records. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:American trumpeters Category:1935 births Category:Living people
title: Herb Alpert
